details.n: Butareba: The Story of a Man Who Turned into a Pig

ratings.en: Otakus Enjoy Being Treated Like Pigs
Even a Pig Will Dance If You Flatter Them Enough
You Most Not Fall in Love with Your Oshi
Be Careful How You Ride a Pig
Nearly All Handsome Guys Are Scumbags
Honest Feelings Should Be Shouted Out Loud
No Two Flowers are the Same
Live and Go Set Your Feet on that Ground
There's Always a Reason Why Things Are the Way They Are
Keep Rewards for When They Really Count
